help_text: View upcoming deliveries, pick lists, pack lists, and labels
Enable order minimum values for delivery schedules
Allow upload of custom background image for a market
View and manage the Users associated with your market
View and manage the Buyers and Suppliers associated with your market
View and manage the Roles associated with your market
View and manage market payment methods
View and manage market deposit accounts
View and manage market colors and background images
View and manage market fees and subscriptions
Allow creation of lots that contain effective and expiration dates, as well as custom numbers
Allow creation of prices that allow custom buyer/market configurations and more granular fee structures
Allow access to advanced delivery cycles (bi-weekly, monthly, monthly by day)
Allow access to merge one order into another
Allow access to duplicate an order to the cart
View and manage inventory storage locations
View organization dashboard, which contains summary graphs and metrics.
View financial summary, create invoices, and enter receipts
View and manage cross selling with other markets
Manage connection to Stripe for CC payments
Allow creation of category market fees
Allow lots to be assigned to specific buyers/markets
Allow access to the catalog to place orders
Allow access to the market about page
Allow access to your organization profile
View routing plan on packing list
Allow creation of product-based fees for a market
